        clientConnection - - The screen on which to render.

    • Method Detail

      • setWindowDimensions

        protected void setWindowDimensions()
        This function is called from the super class. This function sets the position of the inventory to the righthand side of the screen, and makes it take up half the screen.
        Overrides:
        setWindowDimensions in class ContainerMenu

      • createItemGrid

        protected void createItemGrid()
        This function overides the normal createItemGrid function from the super class to make it use as much space as possible.

        createItemGrid in class ContainerMenu
